page.title: 08A TEENAGERS DAY
page.content: As the school day starts at 8.45am in this area then a teenager on a school day would have to get up at about 7.30am.Apart from the usual routine of washing,dressing and eating a breakfast of toast or cereal the introduction of{Breakfast Television has added another activity to be sampled before setting off to school! Once at school a register is taken in the tutor lesson and at 9.05 subject lessons begin, each lasting 40 mins.Break at 10.25 is spent in the hall or outside talking to friends. Dinner at 12.05 can be spent at home or at school.Lessons end at 3.15 but clubs can run on until 4.00. After school homework is completed. Activities afrer this can range from going to the youth club 2 evenings a week, visiting friends or watching television and videos.
